property.name: ERR_MSG_ILLEGAL_CHARACTERS_FOUND
property.value: Error: Illegal characters were found in your Input. Only numbers and the following operators are allowed: sqrt clear undo + - * /

property.name: ERR_MSG_IN_MAIN_PROCESS
property.value: Error in main process_client_input method.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_UNDOING_PREVIOS_OPERATION
property.value: Error undoing previous operation.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_PROCESSING_OPERATOR_WITH_2_NOT_TOP_OF_STACK_NUMBERS
property.value: Error processing Operator with 2 not top of stack numbers.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_PROCESSING_SQUARE_ROOT_NOT_TOP_OF_STACK
property.value: Error processing square root with 1 not top of stack number.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_PROCESSING_SQUARE_ROOT_TOP_OF_STACK
property.value: Error in processing the square root operation with top of stack number.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_OBTAINING_NUMBER_FROM_NOT_TOP_OF_STACK
property.value: Error in obtaining the last number from not top of stack.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_PROCESSING_1_NUMBER_FROM_TOP_OF_STACK_AND_OTHER_FROM_SECOND_FROM_TOP
property.value: Error processing operation with 1 number from the top and the other from the second from top.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_CHECK_IF_VALID_NUMBER_EXISTS_NOT_TOP_OF_STACK
property.value: Error in checking if there is at least 1 numeric item at second from top of stack.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_CHECK_IF_VALID_NUMBER_EXISTS_TOP_OF_STACK
property.value: Error in checking if there is at least 1 numeric item from top of stack.

property.name: ERR_MSG_INSUFFIENT_NUMBERS_TOO_MANY_OPERATORS
property.value: There were insuffient numbers and too many operators.

property.name: ERR_MSG_SQRT_REQUIRED_A_NUMBER_TO_PRECEDE_IT
property.value: Square root operator required a numeric value to precede it.

property.name: ERR_MSG_NUMERIC_VALUE_EXPECTED
property.value: Numeric value expected.

property.name: ERR_MSG_LAST_ITEM_HAS_TO_BE_NUMERIC
property.value: The last item has to be numeric to be usable

property.name: ERR_MSG_WAS_NOT_PUSHED_ONTO_STACK
property.value: was not pushed onto the stack as the previous operation failed.

property.name: ERR_MSG_WERE_NOT_PUSHED_ONTO_STACK
property.value: were not pushed onto the stack as the previous operation failed.

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_LAST_OP_PERFORMED_WAS_SQRT
property.value: Error: Last operation performed was square root of

property.name: ERR_MSG_ERR_LAST_OP_WAS
property.value: Error: Last operation performed was

property.name: AND
property.value: and

property.name: initial_message
property.value: Reverse Polish Notation Calculator. There are 7 operators, namely, 1 'sqrt' 2 '+' 3 '-' 4 '/' 5 '*' 6 'clear' 7 'undo'. One number precedes 'sqrt'. Two numbers precede '+', '-', '/', and '*'. 'clear' clears all. 'undo' undoes previous operation. For example, '3 4 +' means 3 plus 4. '81 sqrt' means square root of 81.
